channel.title: Need help with fixing smithing
channel.description: My smithing is weird when you are converting ore into bars in the furnace you click the furnace and the options come up of different kind of bars you would like to make, the problem is that when you click make 1 , 2 , 5 , 10 or x it only makes 1 at a time no matter which one you select. Need help how do i fix this problem

item.title: Need help with fixing smithing
item.dc:creator: @Alex23 Alex23
item.description:
@Alex23 wrote:

My smithing is weird when you are converting ore into bars in the furnace you click the furnace and the options come up of different kind of bars you would like to make, the problem is that when you click make 1 , 2 , 5 , 10 or x it only makes 1 at a time no matter which one you select. Need help how do i fix this problem
